MTL_TITLE: JCM GEN5 Thermal Printer Head Cleaning
COMPLETION_CRITERIA: Test print shows clear, consistent print quality across full width
No printer error codes displayed on machine diagnostic screen
Paper feeds smoothly without jamming or misalignment
Printer status indicates 'Ready' or 'Online' in diagnostics

TROUBLESHOOTING.Poor Print Quality: Repeat cleaning process, check for worn print head
TROUBLESHOOTING.Paper Jam: Verify correct paper threading path, check for debris in guides
TROUBLESHOOTING.Printer Not Responding: Check power connections, verify firmware version compatibility
TROUBLESHOOTING.Error Codes Persist: Reference JCM service manual for specific error resolution

RELATED_PROCEDURES: GT-006 - JCM GEN5 Firmware Update Process
GT-007 - Thermal Paper Roll Replacement Standards
